Siemens experienced the strongest growth among leading vendors, growing by 9.2 percent last year and climbing to number eleven in chip charts. … [Read more...] about Chip market in decline

People accessing the Internet from work have, thus far, been a huge blind spot for companies measuring Web traffic. This week Nielsen//NetRatings, one of the two dominant measurement ventures, announced what it hails as the biggest initiative yet to bring businesses into the media-measurement pool. … [Read more...] about What sites are you surfing at work?

Apple this week released a new version of its high-speed FireWire connectivity software, which makes it easier for users to move digital video and still photos from digital cameras to the newest generation of G3 Macs. FireWire technology processes video captures from digital-video camcorders and from analog-only equipment using AV-to-FireWire converters. Version 2.0 of the free FireWire driver software is available for download now from Apple's Web site. … [Read more...] about Apple lights fire under FireWire
